{{Lang|'''Morepesok'''|ru=Морепесок|ru_rm=Morepesok|ru_tl=Sea-Sand}} is a small seaside village in [[Snezhnaya]]. It is where [[Tartaglia]] and his family hail from.<ref>{{Ref/CS|Tartaglia|5}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|mini=1|ru=Морепесок|ru_rm=Morepesok|ru_tl=Sea-Sand}} is a compound of the Russian words for {{Lang|"sea"|ru=море|ru_rm=more}} and {{Lang|"sand"|ru=песок|ru_rm=pesok}}, itself referring to a beach or coastline.
